Player History
Traded from Chicago (N) to San Diego on 5/1/2001 (Going to SDN: P O. Dotel, P B. Howry. Going to CHN: SS J. Reyes, LF R. Becker, CF R. Lankford)...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/25/2004 to a 2-year deal worth $1,770,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Anaheim on 2/26/2006 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Traded from Anaheim to Colorado on 7/31/2007 (Going to COL: P O. Dotel, P M. Hollingsworth. Going to ANA: P C. Smith)...
Injured on 5/13/2009 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Colorado to New York (A) on 7/20/2009 (Going to COL: 1B J. Nicolas. Going to NYY: CF J. Feliciano, CF S. Heathcott, P O. Dotel, P J. Juden)...
Injured on 8/26/2009 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Released by New York (A) on 9/9/2009...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 9/9/2009 to a 1-year deal worth $4,200,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/26/2010 to a 4-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Milwaukee on 6/23/2012 (Going to MIL: P O. Dotel. Going to CHW: P E. Bennett)...
Traded from Milwaukee to Chicago (A) on 6/23/2012 (Going to MIL: P E. Bennett. Going to CHW: P O. Dotel)...
Drafted in 2nd round, 42nd overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2017...
Injured on 7/5/2018 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 6/11/2019 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
